DIALOGUE.203: Agkyra is deactivated because local directory "%s" has disappeared. Would you like Agkyra to create it again and restart syncing?
DIALOGUE.204: Agkyra is deactivated because remote container "%s" has disappeared. Would you like Agkyra to create it again and restart syncing?
DIALOGUE.ASK TO SYNC: Should Agkyra start syncing your files?

SETTINGS.TITLE: Settings
SETTINGS.CONTAINER PLACEHOLDER: Name a new or existing Pithos+ container
SETTINGS.CLOUD URL UNEXPECTED RESPONSE: Cloud URL did not respond as expected
SETTINGS.CONFIRM EXIT WITH ERRORS:
There are some concerns about your settings.
To fix the errors: Cancel
To keep them and continue: OK
SETTINGS.EXPLAIN CLOUD: To get your cloud credentials, browse to your cloud website, log in and click on <u>API access</u>. Copy the Authentication URL and Token below.
SETTINGS.EXPLAIN SYNC: The contents of your remote container and your local directory are kept synchronized, which means any changes you make in one side are copied to the other. If you happen to change a file in both sides at the same time, Agkyra will apply one version and copy the other into a separate conflict file.
